TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PivotField extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlCompositeElement

summary.para: PivotTable Field.
When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is x:pivotField.

Docs.remarks:
The following table lists the possible child types:
Items <x:items>
AutoSortScope <x:autoSortScope>
PivotFieldExtensionList <x:extLst>
